name: Juice Challenge
description:
Challenge: Add "juice" to a basic brickout game.

Juice Added:

1. Rainbow trail that follows the ball and fades over time

2. When the ball hits the paddle, the color of the paddle changes to the current color of the ball's trail

3. The ball progressively moves faster the more bricks it hits

3. Screen shakes when the ball collides with something

4. Particle effects when the ball collides with something

5. When the ball hits a brick, a random piano note is played (out of 12 possible notes)

6. When the ball hits a wall, a random drum beat sound is played (out of 3 possible sounds)

7. When the ball hits the paddle, a cymbal sound is played
